mapper.update: update book_area set quantity = #{quantity}, reserved = #{reserved} where book_area_id = #{bookAreaId}
mapper.select: select * from book_area where area_id = #{areaId} and book_id = #{bookId}

select a.area_id, a.area_name, a.capacity, a.inventory_id, a.publisher_id, a.quantity, a.reserved from order_area oa join book_area ba on oa.book_area_id = ba.book_area_id join area a on a.area_id = ba.area_id where oa.order_id = #{orderId}
